original_text: And when they brought those kings out to Joshua, Joshua summoned all the men of Israel and said to the chiefs of the men of war who had gone with him, “Come near; put your feet on the necks of these kings.” Then they came near and put their feet on their necks.
korean_text: 그 왕들을 여호수아에게로 끌어내매 여호수아가 이스라엘 모든 사람을 부르고 자기와 함께 갔던 지휘관들에게 이르되 가까이 와서 이 왕들의 목을 발로 밟으라 하매 그들이 가까이 가서 그들의 목을 밟으매

sentences.original_text: And when they brought those kings out to Joshua
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 왕들을 여호수아에게 데려왔을 때

sentences.original_text: Joshua summoned all the men of Israel
and said to the chiefs of the men of war
put your feet on the necks of these kings.”
sentences.korean_translation: 이 왕들의 목 위에 너희 발을 올려놓으라.”

sentences.original_text: and put their feet on their necks.
